about_the_game:
Step into the tracks of a robotic mercenary in this adrenaline-fueled, post-apocalyptic Roguelite adventure. Battle your way through a ravaged world dominated by rogue machines, where survival depends on your skillful gunplay and strategic choices.

MECHANICAL MAYHEM
Equip yourself with an array of upgradable weapons, swapping between them on each daring expedition through the desolate landscape. From the scorching desert to ominous caverns, treacherous mountain areas, and a terrifying laboratory, adapt your firepower to overcome the robotic hordes that block your way.



UNCOVER A SINISTER PLAN
Embark on a quest to thwart the diabolical plans of Gothel - a singular mind occupying a seemingly endless army of robots, seeking to enslave the minds of all mechanical beings. Traverse diverse environments, each harboring its own challenges, and gradually unravel the narrative behind this robotic apocalypse.

ALLIES IN A WORLD OF STEEL
Forge alliances with eccentric renegades, rogue merchants, and monstrous constructs as you journey through this hostile realm. Engage with a wide cast of characters, each with their own unique quirks, and delve into many story events that reveal the stakes for this world of sentient machines.



RELENTLESS REPLAY VALUE
Navigate through ever-changing landscapes, each guarded by formidable robotic bosses. Utilize a powerful collection of upgrades to permanently enhance your abilities, ensuring each subsequent escape attempt is deadlier and more strategic than the last, and strategically combine them with new deadly abilities and upgrades unique to each run.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® compatible sound card)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3.7 GHz or better, or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® compatible sound card)

short_description: Find and fight for the remnants of humanity in this post-apocalyptic action roguelike dungeon crawler. Unlock powerful perks and an enormous arsenal of weapons as you fight your way through desolate world, alone or with up to 4 players online
